title: Bugsplat reports on a corruption error that prevented me from loading into the client,
body: this keeps happening in ranked games and when i repair the the corrupted files,like the report says, nothing changes. pls help

replies.body: It sounds like you have some bad game files that's failing to render the game properly.  In addition to the repair, our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide provides more steps towards getting you fixed up.  I also recommend using our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to assist with some of those steps.  Hopefully, this will get you cleaned up and able to play!
